God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing

sentences.english: You look great today. What's happened?
sentences.chinese: 你看起来神采飞扬，发生什么事了？

sentences.english: Can that time is really in high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 可那个时候，真的是神采飞扬的。

sentences.english: When I look in your eyes, I can feel the butterflies.
sentences.chinese: 当我看着你的眼睛，我能看到神采飞扬。
